findings.title: Unprotected constructor
findings.description: The constructor of a contract is unprotected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially alter the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected receive ether function
findings.description: The 'receive Ether' function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected totalSupply function
findings.description: The totalSupply function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it unprotected.

findings.title: Unprotected decimals function
findings.description: The decimals function is accessible externally without any access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify it.

findings.title: Unprotected symbol function
findings.description: The 'symbol' function can be accessed externally without any protection.

findings.title: Unprotected name function
findings.description: The smart contract has an unprotected 'name' function which can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected getOwner function
findings.description: The getOwner function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access to sensitive information.

findings.title: Unprotected allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited approval without any restrictions, which can lead to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected approveMax function
findings.description: The approveMax function does not have any access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to set an unlimited allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential asset loss.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxWalletPercent_base1000 function
findings.description: The setMaxWalletPercent_base1000 function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of wallet percentage settings.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxTxPercent_base1000 function
findings.description: The setMaxTxPercent_base1000 function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected setTxLimit function
findings.description: The setTxLimit function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify the transaction limit.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferFrom function
findings.description: The _transferFrom function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected _basicTransfer function
findings.description: The _basicTransfer function is not properly protected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected checkTxLimit function
findings.description: The checkTxLimit function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected shouldTakeFee function
findings.description: The shouldTakeFee function is internal and lacks proper access control, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate fee-taking logic.

findings.title: Unprotected takeFee function
findings.description: The takeFee function does not have any protection mechanism, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected shouldSwapBack function
findings.description: The shouldSwapBack function lacks access control and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: Unprotected set_sell_multiplier function
findings.description: The set_sell_multiplier function lacks protection and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected tradingStatus function
findings.description: The tradingStatus function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected cooldownEnabled function
findings.description: The cooldownEnabled function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate its state.

findings.title: Unprotected swapBack function
findings.description: The swapBack function lacks protection, potentially leading to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected setIsDividendExempt function

findings.title: Unprotected setDistributionCriteria function

findings.title: Unprotected setShare function
